revised_title: Astronomical Dating of Stonehenge's Original Construction
tldr: The authors attempt to determine the date of Stonehenge's original construction by studying its orientation. They base their investigation on the assumption that Stonehenge was a solar temple, and they analyze the direction of the avenue and the main axis of the structure. The authors conclude that the structure was likely built around the time of the Hyperboreans, an ancient civilization that worshiped the sun.
